file_content.text: He's gone.... I can.... I can finally....
More of you already? I suppose I should be flattered.
Back already, huh? Guess I should be flattered.
So my senses haven't betrayed me. It really is you.
So you've arrived. Good. There's much to be done.
Then let's get started.
I'm ready.
Lana Beniko.
I take it the Republic knows what's happening already.
There are Jedi on Ziost.
Always nice to see a friendly face. I've missed you.
[Flirt] It's good to see you.
You don't belong here, Jedi. You shouldn't have come.
I suppose it was only a matter of time before Havoc Squad turned up.
You're the last person I expected to find here, Captain.
I see I wasn't the first of my kind to arrive.
There are other Jedi here.
Well, someone's got to stop the Emperor, right?
I'm here to help.
I'm not part of any offensive or campaign. I'm not part of the problem.
I'm here to help.
That Jedi's packing a lot of mil-spec gear. But Ziost isn't a battlefront.
Jedi commandos on Ziost....
You sure you didn't expect me just a tiny bit more than that Jedi there?
Jedi on Ziost. Interesting.
It's nice to see a friendly face. I've missed you.
[Flirt] It's good to see you.
Speaking of Jedi, seems I'm not alone.
There are other Jedi here.
I'm not about to start backing down from the Emperor now. And I'm thinking you could use the help.
I'm here to help.
People are in need, and you could use my assistance.
I'm here to help.
I couldn't help but notice you're not one of the Emperor's puppets.
You aren't possessed.
I couldn't help but notice you're not one of Vitiate's puppets.
You aren't possessed.
The SIS knows, at the very least. Difficult to say beyond that--everything's happened so fast.
I've been preparing my mental defenses ever since Yavin Four. Still, resistance hasn't been easy.
I'm trying to avert a mass catastrophe while keeping the most powerful mind in the galaxy out of my head. I... I can't think about that.
Easily said, but it's all gotten out of hand rather quickly. And, as you can see, there are complications.
That Jedi whose mind was not his own, he belonged to the Sixth Line.
The Jedi you fought belonged to the Sixth Line. SIS commandos who follow their own addendum to the Jedi Code, hence the name.
Sixth Line.... I've never heard of it.
"There is no contemplation, there is only duty." Great point of view--so long as they're working for you.
Pardon the interruption. I sent a probe droid to look into that crashed shuttle, Minister Beniko. It's empty.
"Minister Beniko."
This is Agent Rane Kovach. He's been something of a rising star in Sith Intelligence here on Ziost.
Yes, well, I was never a fan of titles.... I'm afraid this one's going to stick.
Agent Kovach, this is the former ally I've mentioned. Right now, we all want the same thing, so I suggest we work together.
He called you "minister."
I'd like to hear more about these Jedi. Do we know what they were up to here?
Why are the Jedi here?
Okay, fine. Tell me about this crashed shuttle.
Shuttle?
I've not heard much of anything about the new organization. I'd like to know how things are coming along.
How is Intelligence doing?
If you're offering assistance, I'll take it. Things are quickly spiraling out of control.
We believe Theron Shan attempted to slip onto Ziost unnoticed and was shot down. He's the one responsible for the Jedi presence here.
Yes, he did.
Nothing we've done will matter if we don't address what's happening now.
We know Theron Shan was on that shuttle. And we know he's responsible for the Sixth Line being on Ziost in the first place.
Theron's here to stop the Emperor, same as me.
Vitiate is not our Emperor. Not anymore.
As you've witnessed, Vitiate is taking hold of an increasing number of soldiers and Sith. His goal continues to be the accumulation of power. Agent?
The Sixth Line arrived when Vitiate started making moves. It's not clear yet how Agent Shan knew to send them, but we do know he's responsible.
You can thank our friend Theron Shan for that.
Commander. It's a distinct honor.
So far, Theron has only added to our troubles. He'd better not be here to cause any more.
Though you might as well be, as you can plainly see.
Well, you're not wrong about that. As you can see, things are already out of hand.
In that case, you should be made aware of what we now face.
They're a team of Jedi commandos working in secret for the SIS. They follow their own addendum to the Jedi Code, hence the name.
The Jedi.... An unfortunate complication.
Not in our war, no, it isn't.
The dark side is strong on Ziost. Using the outpost's resources, our former Emperor can massacre the defenseless to fuel him.
The more powerful he becomes, the more people he can control. He will keep on killing until nothing's left.
Yes, I'm on my way.
I'm needed everywhere, all at once. I've already lingered too long. Agent Kovach has a plan to help stem the bloodshed.
It's an honor, my lord. Here's what I have in mind.
Agent?
After the Yavin event, I was sent here to infiltrate Sith Intelligence. I work for Theron Shan. In fact, we were supposed to meet up here.
If you know where he is, now would be the time to say so.
We could use his help.
And you expect me to take your word for it.
So you say....
Lana might seem like the nicest Sith Lord ever, but don't think she won't eviscerate you if she finds you out. Or worse.
You're playing with fire.
I haven't been able to reach him. Not since the crash. Best not to think about that now, I guess.
Hopefully we'll find Agent Shan alive and you won't have to. But first thing's first.
I know all the risks that come with my line of work. It helps not to think about them.
The outpost armory, it's wide open right now. Anyone can get in there. We need to lock it down.
Then point the way.
I'm on it.
The Grand Champion. Good to have you in my corner.
I'll get right to it, Commander.
The outpost armory is wide open right now. It's where the possessed have been getting their firepower. It needs to be placed on lockdown.
Fine. We've stood around long enough.
Let's go.
That won't be enough to stop him.
We must think bigger.
I don't take orders from you.
Don't tell me what to do.
Nor should you. I'm nobody.
No, it won't. But we have to start somewhere.
I'll go out ahead, be your eyes and ears.
I couldn't help but notice you're not possessed.
You aren't a puppet.
